extendedInfo.description: 30 of the most classic TV Sitcom themes from the 70's, 80's and 90's. Settable as either ringtone, notification, individual contact ringtone or alarm.They are instantly recognisable and make amazing ringtones/notifications/alarms.HIGH QUALITY SOUND.FEATURES:* Set as phone ringtone* Set as phone notification* Set as individual contact ringtone - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an individual contact ringtone.* Set as alarm - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an alarm sound.Included:* Alf* Beverly Hills 90210* Cheers* Different Strokes* Everybody Loves Raymond* Family Matters* Family Ties* Friends* Full House* Growing Pains* Home Improvement* King Of Queens* Married With Children* Newhart* Night Court* Perfect Strangers* Roseanne* Saved By The Bell* Seinfeld* Step By Step* That 70's Show* The Cosby Show* The Fresh Prince Of Bel Air* The Golden Girls* The Wonder Years* Third Rock From The Sun* Three's Company* Who's The Boss* Will & GraceAny suggestions are welcome.Any problems please email for an immediate fix.

reviews.title: Thank you so much for this app!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect for so many reasons. Works perfectly. Ty again. I hope you may add more classic ringtones. I\'m telling friends /family about this one! :)
reviews.author: Natalie Tudor
